subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Every floor in a foundry must be level and, in places other than where molten metal is poured, must be composed or similar material or wooden blocks.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Every part of a foundry must be not less than 4.2 m highâ€”

ol.li: where a ceiling is provided, measured from the floor to the ceiling; or
where a ceiling is not provided, measured from the floor to the lowest part of the roof.
